description: Remove deprecated option names. Use the following option names instead (OLD->NEW): api_key->apiKey, idempotency_key->idempotencyKey, stripe_account->stripeAccount, stripe_version->apiVersion, stripeVersion->apiVersion.
Drop support for Node.js 8 and 10. We now support Node.js 12+.
Remove charges field on PaymentIntent and replace it with latest_charge.
The Orders resource has been removed.
The SKU resource has been removed.
Remove support for tos_shown_and_accepted on CheckoutSessionCreateParams.payment_method_options.paynow. The property was mistakenly released and never worked.
Removed deprecated CheckoutSessionCreateParams.subscription_data.items. Use the line_items parameter on the Session instead.
Removed deprecated configuration setter methods (setHost, setProtocol, setPort, setApiVersion, setApiKey, setTimeout, setAppInfo, setHttpAgent, setMaxNetworkRetries, and setTelemetryEnabled).

Change StripeSignatureVerificationError to have header and payload fields instead of detail. To access these properties, use err.header and err.payload instead of err.detail.header and err.detail.payload.
Removed deprecated amount field on Checkout.Session.LineItem.
Removed deprecated basic method definitions. Use basic methods defined on the resource instead.
